lead_paragraph: The Detroit Pistons finally clamped down on defense, in plenty of time to secure their third straight win.

headline.print_headline: Pistons Beat Knicks 102-89 for 3rd Straight Victory
headline.main: Pistons Beat Knicks 102-89 for 3rd Straight Victory

snippet: The Detroit Pistons finally clamped down on defense, in plenty of time to secure their third straight win....
